name: 陳怡靜
objective: This course is served to foreign students who are a beginner of learning Chinese. It will start from the pronunciation and basic grammar. The object is student could listen, speak, and writing some Chinese characters which are used in our daily life. At the final presentation, students could make a grammatical dialogue.
schedule:
week 1--9/11 Warm up and introduce
week 2--9/18 pinyin
week 3--9/25 Initial＆ final four tones
week 4--10/2  First meet/Introduce yourself
week 5--10/9 My family
week 6--10/16  What date is it?
week 7--10/23  What is it?
week 8--10/30 Where is it?
week 9--11/6 midterm
week 10--11/13 Ask for directions
week 11--11/20 Let’s go shopping
week 12--11/27 Make a phone call
week 13--12/4 Dining out
week 14--12/11 Make a trip plan
week 15--12/18 Presentation
week 16--12/25 Presentation
week 17--1/1 holiday 
week 18--1/8 final exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance 20%
Quiz and assignment 20%
Presentation 20%
Mid-term 20%
final exam 20%
materials:
國立臺灣師範大學國語教學中心，《當代中文課程第一冊》。台北 : 聯經出版。
